title: Check Out The Brand New Poster Of Irrfan Khan’s Hindi Medium
text: tweet Here’s a brand new poster of Irrfan Khan starrer Hindi Medium . The interesting poster features two different sides of a story, on one side, we see a man’s feet sporting torn footwear while the other one shows a polished person’s feet with shiny shoes. The caption reads, “Cheating. Lying. Parents will do anything to get their children admitted into the right school.” Check out the poster here: Check Out: Brand New Poster Of Irrfan Khan’s Hindi Medium Directed by Saket Chaudhary, the film is slated to release on May 12th, 2017. SHARE
